item.title: 奇货可居：Affirm 的 Max Levchin 谈 BNPL 如何真正发挥作用（播客）
item.description: 马克斯-莱夫钦（Max Levchin）可能是最了解在线支付的人。他是最初的 "PayPal 黑手党 "成员，后来成为 Affirm 的联合创始人兼首席执行官，Affirm 是 "先买后付 "行业中价值 220 亿美元的参与者，希望借此颠覆现有的信用卡公司。虽然 BNPL 正在蓬勃发展，但人们对它如何运作、如何赚钱以及其活动的透明度仍有很多困惑。在本期节目中，我们将与 Max 谈论他创办公司的初衷和原因。【原文：Max Levchin probably knows as much about online payments as anyone. He was part of the original “PayPal mafia,” before going on to become co-founder and CEO of Affirm, the $22 billion player in the Buy Now, Pay Later industry that’s hoping to disrupt the incumbent credit card companies. While BNPL is booming, there is still a lot of confusion about how it works, how it makes money, and how transparent its activities are. On this episode, we speak with Max about why he started his company and why】

item.title: 印度央行回击汇率政策调整猜测
